author: cnbc.com
title: D.A. Davidson & Co. Adds Team Members to Expand Presence in South, Northeast
text:
DENVER--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- D.A. Davidson & Co. today announced growth in its fixed income group with the addition of key institutional sales team members.
“We are very pleased with the experience, depth of knowledge, reputations and strong relationships of each of our new team members,” said Rick Turnage, Head of Fixed Income Sales. “We believe these are the right new people to deliver the great service our clients have come to expect from D.A. Davidson.”
As part of its continued expansion, D.A. Davidson has completed hiring the following professionals, all of whom report to Turnage, in the firm’s Tennessee and New Jersey offices.
Eddie Lyons, Senior Vice President, Institutional Sales. Lyons comes to D.A. Davidson with several years of experience in the securities industry, most recently with Vining Sparks, and will work in D.A. Davidson’s Memphis office.
Mike Stainbrook, Senior Vice President, Institutional Sales. Stainbrook also joins D.A. Davidson with a number of years of experience. He most recently was with Vining Sparks in Memphis.
Rob Humphreys, Senior Vice President, Institutional Sales. Humphries has been involved in the securities industry since 2005, first by representing financial firms as an attorney for the Bass, Berry & Sims law firm and then moving to institutional fixed income sales. He most recently worked with Vining Sparks in Memphis.
Tyler Mefford, Vice President, Institutional Sales. Mefford joins D.A. Davidson after working at INTL FCStone. He previously was with private wealth management at U.S. Trust Bank of America and with the corporate investment bank at JP Morgan Chase. Mefford works from D.A. Davidson’s office in Upper Saddle River, New Jersey.
D.A. Davidson & Co.’s Fixed Income Capital Markets group is a national leader in raising capital through fixed income banking, distribution and depository strategy. With 24 locations in 18 states, the group serves clients including banks, credit unions, insurance companies, bond managers, money managers and trust companies.
About D.A. Davidson Companies
D.A. Davidson Companies is an employee-owned financial services firm offering a range of financial services and advice to individuals, corporations, institutions and municipalities nationwide. Founded in 1935 and headquartered in Montana, with corporate offices in Denver, Los Angeles, Portland and Seattle, the company has more than 1,300 employees and offices in 26 states.
Subsidiaries include: D.A. Davidson & Co., the largest full-service investment firm headquartered in the Northwest, providing wealth management, investment banking, equity and fixed income capital markets services and advice; Davidson Investment Advisors, a professional asset management firm; D.A. Davidson Trust Company, a trust and wealth management company; and Davidson Fixed Income Management, a registered investment adviser providing fixed income portfolio and advisory services.
For more information, visit dadavidson.com or Twitter: @DADavidsonCo .
